name: Aldori Parry
summary: Increase your AC while wielding an Aldori dueling sword.
description:
You can parry attacks against you with your Aldori dueling sword. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirement.Aldori Parry Leads To...

Aldori RiposteTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
